extension.news:
[COLOR orange][B]WatchNixtoons2[/B][/COLOR] - Cartoons & Anime [B]0.3.8:[/B] - Fix for when using favorite items with the old website address.

[B]0.3.3:[/B] - Fixed the Trakt "liked" list display.
